# ocean

**Instance Property**

The name of the ocean associated with the placemark.

## Declaration

```swift
var ocean: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

For coordinates that lie over an ocean, this property contains the name of the ocean.

## Getting landscape information

- **inlandWater**: The name of the inland water body associated with the placemark.

items.description: The name of the inland water body associated with the placemark.
